price: 48. Kaadu aben umaaneh galtó keenih (koros kinnuk) tumbulleeh, elle anqasak sugeenim kecnil obteeh maro keenit hayte digaaláh.
arabic: وَبَدَا لَهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُواْ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wabadā lahum sayyiātu mā kasabū waḥāqa bihim mā kānū bihi yastahziūna
